name: RELMS
description:
Punk is never dead when rebel visionaries can bring you an alternative online future. An immersive multi player experience is now yours to hold.

Choose an EXPRESSION Character then join an active RELM session. You can also choose a STAGE to start in if there are no RELMS active or if you wish to start your own RELM session.

Allow Push Notifications to be current with announcements and updates.
